scripts.deploy: rsync -avz --delete --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.next' --exclude='.git' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='*.map' ./ root@173.249.22.157:/var/www/lunarwaytravels.com && ssh root@173.249.22.157 'cd /var/www/lunarwaytravels.com && npm install && npm run build && pm2 restart lunarwaytravels.com  --update-env'
